timeout.description: The time between commands in seconds

ma.description: The config for the telnet connection to the desk

host.description: The IP address of the desk

user.description: The user name of the user to log in to the desk

password.description: The password of the user on the desk

twitch.description: The config for the Twitch connection

clientId.description: The client ID of the Twitch app the bot runs on

accessToken.description: The access token used to connect to Twitch

channel.description: The Twitch channel the bot should listen to

commands.description: An array of commands the bot reacts to

chatCommand.description: The command that needs to be run in chat, without !

consoleCommand.description: The command that runs on the console

message.description: The message that the bot returns after successful execution

help.description: The help that users can get when running !ma
